sentences_tone.text: Lindsay Lohan: Starlet Lusting After Vladimir Putin!LiLo's suddenly aimed her fiery eyes at "Kremlin Krotch," telling pals she's gonna bed and wed notorious Soviet strongman Vladimir Putin - and then be officially crowned "Princess Pootie-Tang of Russia!"Revealed My Rushin'-To-Tell-Me Spy: "Lindsay got her looney idea of pegging Putin after negotiating a TV interview with a Russian network.Why Katie Holmes Won't Go Public With Dating Jamie Foxx!"Carefully plotting her secret plan to bed the Prime Stud, she demanded a year-long visa and a personal, private meeting to launch a lingering seduction!"But
Putin pooh- poohed LiLo's lame scheme!

The Russian ruler's got spies everywhere ... and chuckled 'Nyet!' to hooking up with the notorious celeb!"Adding that Lindsay's 'not his type,' Putin insisted - jokingly ... or maybe not - that he wouldn't mind dropping a ruble or two on a fling with 'J.Lo!'"
